lead_paragraph:
This election season, The Times is introducing Trailside to Go, an
occasional e-mail that will keep you up to date as major developments occur on the mayoral campaign trail in New York City.

headline.main: Sign Up For New York Mayoral Election Updates

snippet:
This election season, The Times is introducing Trailside to Go, an
occasional e-mail that will keep you up to date as major developments occur on the mayoral campaign trail in New York City.
